item.title: Excerpts of Academic English
item.description: Excerpts Deduction under a suitable smallness condition on the initial data, we show that solutions exist globally and converge exponentially to a constant. An external chemoattractant source is provided in the form of a Dirac distribution scaled by some positive constant We’ll refer to the environments generically as “align” and will distinguish between them explicitly only when necessary. For backward compatibility we therefore give only a warning for this condition instead of a full error, and try to recover using the aligned environment.
